keyword: how many calories is in a pbj
title: How Many Calories in a PB&J?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in a pbj sandwich, with full nutrition facts, macros, basis per sandwich, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a PB&J?
assumptions: Standard PB&J: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; assembled without extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, peanut butter brand, jelly flavor, portion sizes, and additions; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB&J sandwich contains about 400 kcal and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories is in a pbj sandwich?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard PB&J with 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a PB&J?
faqs.a: Around 50 g total carbs, including 20 g sugars from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: Does PB&J have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 18 g fat per sandwich, with 3 g saturated from peanut butter.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a PB&J?
faqs.a: Use less peanut butter, opt for low-sugar jelly, or choose thinner bread slices to reduce totals.
